cards.name: Tower of the Hand
cards.text: Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, if there is a Winter plot card revealed, choose and stand a [stark] character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: The Maidenvault
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After The Maidenvault comes out of shadows, choose a participating Lady character. Stand it and remove it from the challenge. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, kneel The Maidenvault to return it to shadows.

cards.name: Tunnels of the Red Keep
cards.text: Shadow (2). Action: Kneel Tunnels of the Red Keep to return it to shadows. Then, until the end of the phase, each character you control gets +1 STR for each card you control in shadows. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: Shadow of the Isles
cards.text: Shadow (1). Action: Each player chooses a non-limited location he or she controls and discards it from play. If there is a War plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Isles to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Kingdom of Shadows
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal characters with the printed shadow keyword from any faction in your deck.
Increase the cost of each character you marshal by 1. Reduce the cost of the first character you bring out of shadows each round by 2.
